alert.note: Alert for Eastern Orleans; Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:10PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of west central St. Bernard, southeastern St. Charles, southwestern Orleans, northeastern Lafourche, northwestern Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 645 PM CDT... At 608 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking an outflow boundary along a line extending from Metairie to near Avondale to near Bayou Gauche. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Avondale, Metairie, Marrero, Harvey, East New Orleans, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Jean Lafitte, Luling, River Ridge, Ama, Estelle, Woodmere and Elmwood. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 222 and 249. Interstate 510 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 610 between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, be aware of unsecured objects that could become projectiles and consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Orleans; Lower Jefferson; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
